items.summary: Update the centralized site configuration to use the provided contact/WhatsApp number (+91 9182768591), including: (1) WhatsApp display number, (2) WhatsApp wa.me link using 919182768591, and (3) a click-to-call tel: link targetable by UI components.

Add the provided phone number (+91 9182768591) as a visible click-to-call contact option across the site where contact methods are listed (at minimum: Footer and Contact page), and ensure WhatsApp CTAs use the updated WhatsApp link from site configuration.

Include the service named "Complete Business Automation System" in the Services page services list with the same structure as other services (title, whatItIs, whyItMatters, businessImpact) and conversion-focused English copy.

Ensure the website is fully functional end-to-end: all navigation links and primary CTAs route correctly, the contact form submits successfully to the backend for unauthenticated visitors, and the UI provides clear success/error feedback without requiring Internet Identity login.
